item.title: Things I use: Tridactyl
item.description: I’m on a quest of sorts, a quest for max home row time for my fingers. I’m using various tricks to make my computer easier to operate without ever touching a mouse. Enter Tridactyl, vim-like navigation for your Firefox.

item.title: Things I use: tmux
item.description: tmux is an absolutely fantastic piece of software, and one I use daily - even to write this blog! So, here’s my short letter of appreciation to tmux.
